thread.title: 14 Great Ideas For Those Who Are Sick Of Feb's Lovesick Couples - Indiatimes.com
thread.title_full: 14 Great Ideas For Those Who Are Sick Of Feb's Lovesick Couples - Indiatimes.com

title: 14 Great Ideas For Those Who Are Sick Of Feb's Lovesick Couples - Indiatimes.com
text:
Shewali Tiwari February 06, 2017 Amid the hustle and bustle of our routine lifestyle, we often forget to acknowledge the good that we have around us. Have you ever stopped to wonder how much money you could make if you were paid a dime for every time you fret? 
Anyway, we all know that ain’t happening anytime in the near future, we can, however, kickstart a happiness therapy instead. 
Check out these amazing things that you can do to make your February better. 1. Develop a kick-ass morning routine because hangovers and sleep deprivation isn't the right way to live! Ready to conquer the week ahead ✨ #happymonday #feelingmotivated #lezgetit A photo posted by Chloé M. (@fitbychloe) on Feb 6, 2017 at 2:39am PST 2. And while you’re at it, develop a before-bed routine too. (No, we are not recommending going off alcohol) A photo posted by Rhian Shepherd (@iamrhiannon) on Feb 6, 2017 at 2:27am PST #3 Revisit some of your favourite things from childhood. A video posted by Chamonix-Mont-Blanc (@chamonix_france) on Feb 5, 2017 at 9:29am PST 4. And for some maddening fun, attend the MAD decent pre-party! 
Don't forget to block the dates for the pre-party which will take place in Mumbai's Summerhouse Cafe on 9th Feb, Delhi's Summerhouse Cafe on 10th and in Hyderabad's TBA on 11th. 5. Just to keep up with your everyday MOJO, commit to a calming work-life balance. A photo posted by Foot Lover (@footlsave) on Feb 6, 2017 at 3:06am PST 6. Go someplace where no one knows your name/language! A photo posted by Wendy Nguyen (@wendyslookbook) on Feb 5, 2017 at 6:51pm PST 7. Write letters of appreciation to people you love instead of using social media. A video posted by NO! L I F E S T Y L E (@no.life.no.style) on Jan 30, 2017 at 4:26pm PST 8. Try the baking recipe that you have bookmarked since months. A photo posted by PippaRose (@pipparoserambles) on Feb 6, 2017 at 2:50am PST Don't Miss
